sen.j: 柳田 三二郎（やなぎだ さんじろう、生没年不詳）は壬生浪士組及び新選組隊士。
sen.e: Sanjiro(三二郎) YANAGIDA (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of Mibu-Roshigumi (Mibu masterless warriors group) as well as a member of the Shinsengumi (a special force that guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).
sen.cmt: 柳田 三二郎（やなぎだ さんじろう）→Sanjiro(三二郎) YANAGIDAと漢字表記を加えました。 新選組→the Shinsengumi (a special force that guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate)としました。
sen.e: Sanjiro(三二郎) YANAGIDA (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of Mibu-Roshigumi (Mibu masterless warriors group) as well as a member of the Shinsengumi (a special force that guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).

Sanjiro(三二郎) YANAGIDA (year of birth and death unknown) was a member of Mibu-Roshigumi (Mibu masterless warriors group) as well as a member of the Shinsengumi (a special force that guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate).

sen.j: 全盛期には柔術師範を務めた。
sen.e: In his day, he was a master of jujutsu (classical Japanese martial art, usually referring to fighting without a weapon).
In his day, he was a master of jujutsu (classical Japanese martial art, usually referring to fighting without a weapon).
In his day, he was a master of jujutsu (classical Japanese martial art, usually referring to fighting without a weapon).

sen.j: 三次郎と書かれた文献もある。
sen.e: In some references, his first name is written as 三次郎 (Sanjiro).
sen.cmt: 三次郎 (Sanjiro)と漢字表記を加えました。
sen.e: In some references, his first name is written as 三次郎 (Sanjiro).
In some references, his first name is written as 三次郎 (Sanjiro).
His real family name might be INADA.
His real family name might be INADA.
His real family name might be INADA.

sen.j: 梁田佐太郎と同一人物と考えられる。
sen.e: It can be considered that he and Sataro YANADA were the same person.
It can be considered that he and Sataro YANADA were the same person.
It can be considered that he and Sataro YANADA were the same person.
He was born in Awa Province.
He was born in Awa Province.
He was born in Awa Province.
According to another theory, he was from Osaka.
According to another theory, he was from Osaka.
According to another theory, he was from Osaka.

sen.j: 文久三年(1863年)六月以降に新選組（当時は壬生浪士組）に入隊。
sen.e: In July 1863 (表記の変更) or later, he joined the Shinsengumi (then Mibu-Roshigumi)
In July 1863 or later, he joined the Shinsengumi (then Mibu-Roshigumi).
sen.cmt: (表記の変更)を削除しました。ピリオドを追加しました。
sen.e: In July 1863 or later, he joined the Shinsengumi (then Mibu-Roshigumi).

sen.j: 八月十八日の政変に参加したが池田屋事件には不参加。
sen.e: He participated in the Coup of August 18, but he did not took part in the Ikedaya Incident.
He participated in the Coup of August 18, but he did not take part in the Ikedaya Incident.
sen.cmt: took: 現在計に訂正しました。
sen.e: He participated in the Coup of August 18, but he did not take part in the Ikedaya Incident.

sen.j: 慶応元年(1865年)七月までの在隊が確認されている。
sen.e: His enrollment in the Shinsengumi is traced up to August 1865 (表記の変更).
His enrollment in the Shinsengumi is traced up to August 1865.
sen.cmt: (表記の変更)を削除しました。
sen.e: His enrollment in the Shinsengumi is traced up to August 1865.

sen.j: このときに松原忠司とともに柔術師範となる。
sen.e: It is documented that he was appointed as a master of Jujutsu together with Chuji MAYSUBARA.
It is documented that he was appointed as a master of Jujutsu together with Chuji MAYSUBARA.
It is documented that he was appointed as a master of Jujutsu together with Chuji MAYSUBARA.

sen.j: 慶応三年(1867年)頃に知友の村田左衛門（倒幕派）に隊内の機密情報を漏洩。
sen.e: Around 1867, he leaked the Shinsengumi's confidential information to his acquaintance Saemon MURATA (anti-Tokugawa Shogunate faction).
Around 1867, he leaked the Shinsengumi's confidential information to his acquaintance Saemon MURATA (anti-Tokugawa Shogunate faction).
Around 1867, he leaked the Shinsengumi's confidential information to his acquaintance Saemon MURATA (anti-Tokugawa Shogunate faction).

sen.j: 当時、五十歳前後とされ、隊内最高齢者であったという。
sen.e: It is said that at that time, he was aged around 50 and the oldest member.
It is said that at that time, he was around 50 and the oldest member.
It is said that at that time, he was around 50 and the oldest member.

sen.j: また、碁打ちを好んだという。
sen.e: It is said that he was fond of playing Igo (Japanese board game of capturing territory).
It is said that he was fond of playing Igo (Japanese board game of capturing territory).
It is said that he was fond of playing Igo (Japanese board game of capturing territory).

sen.j: 漏洩が関係したのか、同年六月以前に脱走した。
sen.e: He ran away from the Shinsengumi some time before July 1867, and the reason might be related to this secret leak.
He ran away from the Shinsengumi some time before July 1867, and the reason might be related to this secret leak.
He ran away from the Shinsengumi some time before July 1867, and the reason might be related to this secret leak.
His life after this incident was unknown.
His life after this incident is unknown.
sen.cmt: was ⇒ is に訂正しました。
sen.e: His life after this incident is unknown.
